original_text: When the baby was eight days old, it was time for the priest to circumcise him. His parents gave him the name ‘Jesus’. The angel had told Mary that they must give him that name. He told her that before she had the baby inside her.
korean_text: 할례할 팔 일이 되매 그 이름을 예수라 하니 곧 잉태하기 전에 천사가 일컬은 바러라

sentences.original_text: When the baby was eight days old
it was time for the priest to circumcise him
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장이 그에게 할례를 행할 때가 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: His parents gave him the name 'Jesus'
that they must give him that name
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 그 이름을 주어야 한다고

sentences.original_text: before she had the baby inside her
